title: Database
text: Ms SQL Server, T-SQL, SQL (MS SQl Server, MongoDb, NoSql, Elasticsearch(https://bonsai.io/))

title: Front-end
text: JavaScript (Angular.js, (Grunt or Gulp), Typescript, JQuery, Node.js), CSS, LESS, Bootstrap Framework

title: Back-end
text: ASP.NET MVC, C#, ASP.NET Web API, C#, Dependency Injection (Ninject, AutoFac, Castle Windsor) SOA (Microservices) OOP (SOLID Principles)

title: Devops
text: AWS (EC2, RDS, SQS, ElastiCache) Continuous Integration / Delivery (TFS, Git, Octopus, Teamcity, Visual Studio Cominty, JIRA)
